ABOUT_TEXT: I-STAFF offers complete accommodation solutions on the island of Mykonos, upgrading the standards of the residences for seasonal workers. I-STAFF addresses both individuals seeking accommodation for the summer season and companies facilitating them with the accommodation of their employees. At the same time, I-STAFF acts as an intermediary for property owners looking for tenants, guaranteeing that the property will be returned in its original condition after the end of the rental period.
CONTACT_TEXT: Fill out the form and out team will get back to you as soon as possible.
COOKIES_POLICY_GENERAL:
We use cookies to help you navigate efficiently and perform certain functions. You will find detailed information about all cookies under each consent category below.
The cookies that are categorized as "Necessary" are stored on your browser as they are essential for enabling the basic functionalities of the site.
We also use third-party cookies that help us analyze how you use this website, store your preferences, and provide the content and advertisements that are relevant to you. These cookies will only be stored in your browser with your prior consent.
You can choose to enable or disable some or all of these cookies but disabling some of them may affect your browsing experience.
COOKIES_POLICY_SECTION1: Necessary cookies are required to enable the basic features of this site, such as providing secure log-in or adjusting your consent preferences. These cookies do not store any personally identifiable data.
COOKIES_POLICY_SECTION2: Functional cookies help perform certain functionalities like sharing the content of the website on social media platforms, collecting feedback, and other third-party features.
COOKIES_POLICY_SECTION3: Analytical cookies are used to understand how visitors interact with the website. These cookies help provide information on metrics such as the number of visitors, bounce rate, traffic source, etc.
COOKIES_POLICY_SECTION4: Performance cookies are used to understand and analyze the key performance indexes of the website which helps in delivering a better user experience for the visitors.
COOKIES_POLICY_SECTION5: Advertisement cookies are used to provide visitors with customized advertisements based on the pages you visited previously and to analyze the effectiveness of the ad campaigns.
COPYRIGHT_TEXT: The entire content of this website, including real estate data, texts, graphics, photos, videos, services provided, is the intellectual property of i-staff.gr and is governed by national and international provisions on Intellectual Property. Logos, brands, trademarks and features included in the website belong to i-staff.gr and are protected in accordance with the existing legislation on industrial and intellectual property.
HOW_IT_WORKS_TEXT1: You contact our office describing your needs, the number of employees you wish to house, your housing criteria and available budget.
HOW_IT_WORKS_TEXT2: We search for properties that fully meet the needs we have previously discussed so that we can provide your staff with the best possible accommodation during their working hours.
HOW_IT_WORKS_TEXT3: Upon acceptance of the offer, we will bring you in contact with the owners of the properties you have chosen in order to complete the leasing process.
HOW_IT_WORKS_TITLE2: We search for the best accommodation arrangements
HOW_IT_WORKS_TITLE3: Bring you in contact with estate owners

PRIVACY_POLICY_GENERAL: This Privacy Statement applies to personal information collected by istaff.gr in connection with the services it offers. This includes information collected online through our websites, and applications. This Privacy Statement also applies to targeted content of, for our office services, which we (or a service provider acting on our behalf) may send to you on third party websites, platforms and applications ("Third Party Sites") derived from your information through website use ("as identified below"). These Third Party Sites may have their own privacy policies and terms and conditions. We encourage you to read them before using them. This Privacy Statement is incorporated herein and forms part of the terms and conditions of use of the applicable istaff.gr website. For any information about who the Company's contact person is for the protection of your personal information, please see the section on your privacy rights and who to contact below.
PRIVACY_STATEMENT_SECTION1: By using our website, you consent to the collection, use and disclosure of your personal information by our brokerage firm as set forth in this Privacy Statement. If you do not consent to the collection, use and disclosure of your personal information in this manner, please do not use the website or otherwise provide our brokerage with your personal information. Our brokerage will only collect , use or disclose your personal information where it may lawfully and fairly do so. Usually, we will ask for your consent explicitly, but in some cases, your consent will be deemed to be granted on the basis of your actions and conduct. You may be asked to provide additional consent if we need to use your personal information for purposes not covered by this statement. You are not required to provide such consent, but if you do, your access to certain actions may subsequently be limited. If you provide additional consent, the terms of that consent will prevail in the event of a conflict with the terms of this Privacy Statement. Please note, however, that it is possible for us to process your personal information without your consent if there is a legitimate reason, provided that such use will not have a detrimental effect on your rights, freedoms and interests. Any such use will be in accordance with our brokerage's Privacy Principles as set out above.
PRIVACY_STATEMENT_SECTION2: The istaff.gr website is designed and intended for use by adults. When a website is intended for use by a younger audience, parental or guardian consent is sought before we collect personal information, whenever we believe it is appropriate to do so or where required by applicable laws and regulations. Where it is determined that we have collected information from a minor without the consent of the minor's parent or guardian, we will delete the information as soon as possible.
PRIVACY_STATEMENT_SECTION3: For the purposes of this Privacy Notice, "personal information" is defined as information or a portion of information that may allow you to be identified. This usually includes information such as your name, address, profile picture, email address, phone number, but may also include other information such as your IP address, shopping habits, lifestyle information and information about your preferences such as hobbies and interests. We may collect your personal information from a variety of sources, including the following:
PRIVACY_STATEMENT_SECTION3B: We may collect information from you directly when you provide us with personal information, for example, when you register, sign up to receive information, use applications, purchase a product or service from us, complete a survey, or make a comment or inquiry. The types of information we may collect directly from you include:
PRIVACY_STATEMENT_SECTION3B2: user-related content, postings and any other content you submit to the website oany other personal information you voluntarily provide to us.
PRIVACY_STATEMENT_SECTION3C:
We use cookies and other tools (such as web analytics tools) to automatically collect information about you when you use the istaff.gr website, in accordance with the terms of this Privacy Statement and applicable laws and regulations. The types of information automatically collected may include:
Information about the type of processor (browser) you use
Details about the type of browser you use (browser you use), the type of browser you use, the type of browser you use, the type of browser you use, the type of browser you use, the type of browser you use, the type of browser you use.
Your IP address
Your username, profile picture, gender, networks and any other information you choose to share when you use Third Party Sites (such as when you use the "Like" feature on Facebook or the +1 feature on Google+)
websites you visited before you came to istaff.gr
Most Internet browsers were originally created to accept cookies. You can change the settings to block cookies or to be notified when cookies are sent to your device. If you use different browsers, or use multiple devices, you may need to change the settings for each browser on each device. However, please note that if you disable cookies, this may affect your browsing experience on istaff.gr.
PRIVACY_STATEMENT_SECTION3D: We may receive personal information about you from other legal sources, including information from commercially available sources, like public databases and third party data and information providers. The types of information we may collect directly from you include:
PRIVACY_STATEMENT_SECTION3D_HABITS: preferences and information about your lifestyle, such as your hobbies and interests
PRIVACY_STATEMENT_SECTION3D_PUBLIC: publicly available information, like content provided by the user, personal blogs and posts provided it is legally allowed
PRIVACY_STATEMENT_SECTION4: We may share information derived from the use of the website with trusted third parties (e.g. companies that provide real estate services such as iarts' Real Status, advertising companies, advertising networks, data exchanges, etc.). These third parties may set and access their own cookies, and other similar tracking technologies on your device, so that we can provide you with customized materials and advertisements when you visit istaff.gr. In some countries, we have adopted the use of identifiable symbols (e.g., the AdChoices icon), which may appear alongside targeted advertisements that we (or a service provider acting on our behalf) send to you based on information from your use of the website. You can click on these icons to get more information about our collection and use of your information or to opt-out of such collection in the future. Please note that even if you opt out, you may still receive updates or advertisements from us , which are not tailored to you through information from your Use of the Website. Depending on your location, there may be other ways to help you control your online preferences (such as that third parties may collect and use your personal information for targeted advertising purposes).
PRIVACY_STATEMENT_SECTION5:
We may use your personal information to:
Improve our services and your experience on the istaff.gr website.
To evaluate your use of the istaff.gr website and our services.
To analyse the effectiveness of our advertisements, competitions and offers.
To personalise your experience on our website, and to evaluate (anonymously and in aggregate) statistics about activity on the website, such as what time you visited it, whether you have visited it in the past and which website you were directed to it through.
To make the istaff.gr website easier to use and to better tailor it to your interests and choices.
To accelerate your future activities and experience on the istaff.gr website. For example, a website may recognize that you have provided your personal information and will not ask for the same information a second time.
Collect information about the device you use to view the istaff.gr website, such as your IP address or the type of Internet browser or operating system you use, and link this to your personal information to ensure that the istaff.gr website provides the best online experience for you.
To communicate with you about products and services that may be of interest to you, as long as you have given your consent for us to do so or you have previously requested a product or service from us and the communication is relevant or related to that previous request and has been made within the statutory time limits.
To recommend products or services (including third party products or services ) that we think may be of interest to you
Offer you the opportunity to take part in competitions or promotions. You may opt out of receiving such communication from us at any time. Any direct marketing communication we send you will provide the information and means necessary for you to opt out.
To supply you with products or services that you have requested from us competitions or promotions in which you have entered.
To send you the information, products or samples you have requested.
Respond to your questions or comments.

In order to protect your information from accidental or malicious destruction, when we delete information from our services we will not directly delete residual copies from our servers or directly remove data from our systems' backups.
PRIVACY_STATEMENT_SECTION6: We may make available a service through which you may receive a text or other types of messages from us, such as SMS (short message service), MMS (multimedia messaging service), or EMS (enhanced messaging service) on your wireless or mobile device ("Mobile Messaging Service"). If you subscribe to one of our Mobile Messaging Services, you will be deemed to have agreed to receive such messages from us at the address or mobile number you have provided for that purpose (unless and until you have opted out of receiving such messages by following the instructions shown in the section below entitled Your Privacy Rights and Who to Contact
PRIVACY_STATEMENT_SECTION6B: You acknowledge and agree that the Mobile Messaging Service is provided through wireless systems that use appropriate means to transmit communications over complex networks. We do not guarantee that your use of the Mobile Messaging Service will be private or secure, and we are not liable to you for any lack of privacy or security that you may experience. You bear full responsibility for taking security measures appropriate to your circumstances and intended use of the Mobile Messaging Service. We may also access the contents of your wireless and/or mobile phone account with your carrier for the purpose of identifying and resolving technical problems and/or complaints related to the service.
PRIVACY_STATEMENT_SECTION7: Our real estate agency may share your personal information with trusted third parties based in Greece so that they can process the data on our behalf. Where we share your personal information with another company with trusted third parties, we will make every effort to ensure that we keep your information secure, take every possible measure to protect it from misuse and only use it in a manner consistent with our instructions, this Privacy Statement and applicable data protection laws and regulations. We may also share your personal information with companies, organisations or individuals outside our office if we believe that disclosure of the information is necessary for legitimate reasons. If you have any questions, comments or concerns about how we handle your personal information, please see "Your privacy rights and who to contact" below. Our brokerage does not sell your personal information.
PRIVACY_STATEMENT_SECTION8: We may transfer your personal information to servers or trusted third party partners so that they can process your personal information on our behalf. By using the istaff.gr website and by providing us with your personal information, you agree that we may do so in accordance with the terms of this Privacy Statement and applicable data protection laws and regulations. You should be aware that your personal information may be accessed by judicial, law enforcement and national security authorities in accordance with applicable law. If we are subject to such a procedure, we are committed that anyone processing your personal data must implement measures to protect it and is only legally entitled to process it in accordance with our office's instructions.
PRIVACY_STATEMENT_SECTION9: We take all reasonable steps to keep your personal information secure and require third parties who handle or process your personal information to do the same. Access to your personal information is restricted to prevent unauthorised access, modification or misuse and is only permitted between our employees and associates where they are required to know it.
PRIVACY_STATEMENT_SECTION10: If you have any questions, comments or concerns about how we handle your personal information, then you can contact us.
PRIVACY_STATEMENT_SECTION11:
If you have any questions, comments or concerns about how we handle your personal information, then you can contact us.
You have the right to tell us if:
You do not wish to be contacted by us in the future
Do you wish to receive a copy of the personal information that we hold about you?
You wish to have your personal information corrected, updated or deleted from our records
You wish to report any misuse of your personal information
To assist us in fulfilling your requests, please provide your name and details.
PRIVACY_STATEMENT_SECTION12: We may change this Privacy Statement from time to time by posting an updated version of this Privacy Statement on the istaff.gr website. For our part, we will give you reasonable notice of any material change. We encourage you to visit them frequently to keep up to date on how we use your personal information.

TERMS_OF_USE_SECTION1:
I-STAFF, through its website, istaff.gr, provides the visitor/user of its website with the opportunity to be informed about the Company and the services it provides. We urge you, before browsing the website, to carefully read the following Terms of Use.
The use of the website implies the unconditional and full acceptance of the terms and conditions mentioned, which apply to the entire content of the website. The visitor/user of the website acknowledges that he/she is bound by them during his/her visit.
TERMS_OF_USE_SECTION2:
The term "website", "website" is defined as the website istaff.gr
By the use of the first person plural and the terms "ISTAFF" or "Company", it means the Sole Proprietorship "CESIBON", Ftelia Mykonos, 84600, Tax ID 801237469, Tax Office of Mykonos.
Using the second plural person and "users", "visitors", means the visitors/users of the website.
"Terms" means the terms of use mentioned herein.
TERMS_OF_USE_SECTION3: As a visitor, you have the obligation to use the website exclusively for legitimate purposes and in accordance with the rules of Greek, EU and international law, in particular the legislation governing telecommunications, acting in good faith and in accordance with good morals. The visitor must refrain from any illegal and abusive behaviour when using the website and in relation to it, as well as from adopting unfair competition practices or other practices that are contrary to the law and that may cause consequences or damage to other visitors or malfunction of the website and consequently the Company.
TERMS_OF_USE_SECTION4:
The entire content of the website, including, but not limited to, names and distinctive titles, trademarks, texts, images, graphics and layouts, services provided, programs, data, software, news, articles and informational materials of any form, are objects exclusive intellectual and industrial property rights of I-STAFF or its respective beneficiary, are governed and protected by the relevant provisions of Greek, EU and international intellectual (intellectual and industrial) property law, with the exception of protected rights of third parties.
It is expressly stated that it is prohibited without the prior written permission of the Company, in whole or in part to copy, sell, exploit, modify, publish, transmit, perform, issue, upload, transfer, reproduce, distribute, present or otherwise use the content contained on the website in any manner or medium, for commercial or other purposes.
All other trademarks, distinctive features and intellectual property products of third parties, which may appear on the website, are protected under the responsibility of their legal owners.
TERMS_OF_USE_SECTION5:
Although I-STAFF makes every effort to ensure that the information included on the website is complete, accurate, up-to-date and clear, the visitor is solely responsible for the use, evaluation and exploitation of the information provided through the website . information. The Company is not responsible for any technical problems that may occur when accessing the website and during it and related to the operation or compatibility of the user's infrastructure with the use of the website.
The Company informs you that in no way, including this negligence, does not arise its own responsibility for the damage, which may be caused in this use of the website and the information contained therein.
TERMS_OF_USE_SECTION6:
Access to the website is provided solely at the initiative of the visitor/user, who is solely responsible for having the appropriate equipment, software, telecommunications equipment and service necessary to access the website. Also, the user is responsible for protecting their system from viruses and other malicious software.
I-STAFF has taken, as far as possible, all the necessary measures, including the upgrading of protection systems and the use of program objects, in order to ensure high security and to protect the website from viruses and malware. Also, the Company controls access to the websites with security systems to prevent attacks and other unauthorized actions.
Nevertheless, the Company does not guarantee that the content of the website is free of viruses or other harmful elements and is not responsible for the technical damage to the user, to the software or to its files, due either to use/copying/loading or alteration or in other attacks with third-party viruses or in permitted interventions in files and information available through the website, as well as for other websites that the user may suffer from the above causes.
TERMS_OF_USE_SECTION7: I-STAFF reserves the right to modify at any time and when it deems necessary the present Terms and the content of the website, the updated ones which are always available on the website. The Terms of Use, as formed by the most recent modification, are always considered valid. Users must check each time for possible modifications and, if they continue to use the website, it will be documented that they have accepted the modifications.

WHY_REASON1_TEXT: With years of experience in the Mykonos real estate market, we guarantee the best result for your particular needs.
WHY_REASON2_TEXT: Our goal is to deliver to your business solutions with the best value for money.
WHY_SUPPORT_TEXT: You will always have an experienced colleague of us by your side.
